SENT.plain: An abnormal variant of antithrombin III is reported in a young male with deep vein thrombosis
The heparin cofactor, progressive thrombin inhibition, and factor Xa inactivation are decreased
The abnormality seems to be a mutation which is transmitted in an autosomaldominant way
The half-life and fractional catabolic rate of 125I antithrombin III concentrate is the same in this patient as in patients with the classic type of antithrombin III deficiency and in a control
